translations: n.共济会纲领；共济会会员；惺惺相惜

phrs.translation: 共济, 同病相怜, 济会, 互助会

sentences.sentence: He was very active in Freemasonry.
sentences.translation: 他在共济会组织很活跃。

sentences.sentence: Soon it had infiltrated all of the European freemasonry and it then went on to America.
sentences.translation: 很快，它已渗透到所有的欧洲收取，并接着到美国。

sentences.sentence: On this principle does the Institution of Freemasonry diffuse its influence to the world of mankind.
sentences.translation: 在这个原则是否学会，自由的弥漫其影响力，向世界人类。
